metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Piano Sonata No 14 ''Moonlight'' 1st Movement is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Piano Sonata No 14 ''Moonlight'' 1st Movement has sections analyzed in the following keys: C♯ Minor, E Minor, F♯ Minor,  and E Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
